# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position 10.5, 10.5), boiler(position -6.0, 24.5) and offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(43.0, -84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position 43.0, -84.0) and a furnace at position(40.0, -82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position -15.0, -50.0) and a furnace at position(40.0, -79.0)

### Iron plate factory
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position 40.0, -82.0) 
-  Furnace (position 45.0, -83.0) 
-  Furnace (position 42.0, -81.0) 
-  Furnace (position 45.0, -80.0) 
-  Furnace (position 40.0, -79.0) 

### Lab
Consists of lab at position unknown

### Storage
Consists of following entities
-  Chest (position 43.5, -82.5) 
-  Chest (position 40.5, -80.5) 
-  Chest (position 43.5, -81.5) 
-  Chest (position 2.5, 0.5) 

### Inserter system
Consists of following entities
-  Burner inserter (position 3.5, 0.5) 
-  Burner inserter (position 0.5, 3.5) 

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner mining drills
- Ensure burner mining drills have sufficient fuel to operate
- Ensure burner mining drills are connected to a furnace to smelt the extracted resources

### Errors when using furnaces
- Ensure furnaces have sufficient fuel to operate
- Ensure furnaces have the necessary ingredients to smelt

### Errors when using boilers
- Ensure boilers have sufficient fuel to operate
- Ensure boilers are connected to a steam engine to generate electricity

### Errors when using steam engines
- Ensure steam engines are connected to a boiler to receive steam
- Ensure steam engines are connected to a power network to supply electricity

### Errors when using offshore pumps
- Ensure offshore pumps are connected to a boiler to supply water
- Ensure offshore pumps are connected to a pipe network to transport water

### Errors when using pipe networks
- Ensure pipe networks are properly connected to transport fluids
- Ensure pipe networks have sufficient fluid to operate

### Errors when using electricity networks
- Ensure electricity networks are properly connected to supply power
- Ensure electricity networks have sufficient power to operate
